resources.string: Unlock additional features and become a patron to support continued development!
Bluetooth Volume Manager has no ads and doesn\'t sell user data. Continued development is only made possible by you.
Become a patron and sponsor development! Tap the button below to activate all extra features and open my GitHub Sponsors profile.

• A motivated developer 🧙
• Unlimited devices ➡️➡️
• Extra actions ⚙️
and more…
The alternative are ads, analytics and Google Play 🙁
Thank you for supporting open-source development ❤️
